div.p:
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xijo die Julij
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die murthacus glenmaluin tercio die vocatus ad intrandum Willelmum richardson ad
sectam Roberti ewynson non intrauit eundem / quare precipitur seriando capere districtum et cetera
et premunire dictum murthacum ad comparere faciendum prefatum Willelmum ad instanciam predicti roberti
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorum diem huius processus

Alexander rolland is adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' borgh strekin on androw vaus
of the halding of a bote with certane buyrdis and aaris and the said androw quite of his
challance throu his aith made with consent of the said alexander et cetera

Johannes Wormot super quem murthacus glenmaluin extendit plegium pro iniusta deten
cione xxxta solidorum ab eodem primo die vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio / non comparuit Ideo preci
pitur Duncano stralogh seriando quod capto districto a dicto Johanne ipsum summoneat ad
proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

the balyeis has delayit the action betuix Wilyam goldsmyth and Johne stevin
son anens a kettil vnto the morn in sic fourm and effect as this dai with consent of
parties / and than the matir tilhaf a finale sentence and end / les than thai
can accord tharuppon in the mene tyme

The court decretit the copy of the instrument producit in Jugement be Johne talyour
and his procuratour quhare James mortymer has chosin the said John' tobe his
curate et cetera tobe deliuerit til ser Dauid vaus on his expens' and toansuer' til it this
day xv daies

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies of abirdene the xiij dai of the moneth
of Julij forsaid gilbert the vaus grantit him awand til James lesly a rydar' of
gold of the quhilk the ballies has chargit him tocontent and pay the said James within
terme of law

The samyn dai thomas symson burges of abirdene has resignit his land liand
in the ovirkirkgate betuix the land of vmquhile Wilyam rolland on the
north part and the land of adam of crafurd on the southe part in the hand
of thomas of fife ane of the ballies of the burgh of abirdene sittand in Jugement
in the tolbuthe of the samyn for the securite of payment of viij li' g' and demi
eftir the tenour of the deliuerence of ane sworn assise betuix John' fichet and Johne
rolyn duelland in auslo togiddir with the costis and expensis and scathis And gif
it happinnis the said Johne rolyn tofalye in the bringing of the certificacion
within the terme contenit in the deliuerence of the assise that is within yer' and dai
It salbe lesum to the said thomas of fife or til Wilyam blindsel or Dauid
marr' balyeis quhilkis war present with him in Jugement in the tym tosell and til dispo
ne apon the forsaid land quhil the some' of viij li' g' and demi with the costis and scathis
be content and pait til the said Johne fichet or his procuratouris but ony obstacle'
reuocacion or demand' made or that may be made be the said thomas symson
his ayris executouris or assignais witnes heirof alexander menyes James les
ly gilbert the vaus adam of crafurd Wilyam goldsmyth and othiris sindry

Item the samyn dai Johne fichet has in likewise resignit his land liand
in the ovirkirkgate besyde the land of vmquhile androw scherar' in the handis
of thomas of fife ane of the ballies of abirdene to fulfil and kepe the deliuerance
of the sworn assise that is tosay / gif the said John' rolyn bringis ane
certificacion that the said Johne fichet sauld his part of the schip and is pait
tharof / within yer' and dai forsaid . his said land salbe sald and demainnit in maner'
and fourm before expremyt quhil the said Johne rolyn or his procuratouris be content
and pait of al costis and scathis sustenit throu the arresting made be
Johne fichet and this was done in presence of the witnez before nemmyt

Item the said Johne rolyn has constitute and ordanit thomas symson his procuratour
til ask ressaue and optene ful contentacion and payment of his costis and scathis
fra Johne fichet / gif if sa be that the certificacion cumis that the said John' fichet sald
his part / of the schip and is pait tharfor eftir the fourm of the deliuerence of the assise / and
todo and defend for him in that matir as he war bodily present promittand tohald ferm
and stable et cetera

The samen dai It was decretit be the court and gevin for dome that Wilyam gold
smyth is cumin til his clame and caus' againnis Johne stevinson of the wrang
wise withhaldine fra him of a kettyl because the said John' falyeit in his
preif this dai peremptourly assignit tharto and that the said Johne sal content and pay
Wilyam goldsmyth of the said kettil or the vail tharof within terme of law

Item William goldsmyth producit in Jugement magnus Wormot anent the price of
the said kettil / quhilk sworn declarit / that the preist that sauld the sammyn
kettyl sayd til him in his lawte and in verbo sacerdocij that it was sald for xxxj s'

The xvj dai of Julij yer' et cetera lxxxiiij the consel and diuers' of the communite that is tosay
Alexander of chamer alexander menyes James lesly Wilyam blindsel alexander marr' maistir
androw cadiow androw culan thom prat adam of crafurd alexander forbes John' glenmaluin
Wilyam malisson androw branche Walter achneve Johne menyes Johne more
gilbert leche patrik adamson androw goldsmyth and vthiris / has feit Richert
ancram mason' to Sanct nicolace wark for a yer' for twenty merkis
of fee fra the day that Dauid menyes pait him the hender end of his
fee of xx li' that he was feit for the yer' bigane / And thai haf orda
nit the ten merkis that suld be gevin for alexander howison / tobe pait til the
said richert ancram in his fie /

Wilyam gray in the name of his wif in amerciament for the wrangwis' strub
lance and taking fra mage seruitour til alexander rede of xxj s'

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xixno die
Julij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto /

quo die de seruicio breuis Inquisicionis Alexandri
skene filij et heredis quondam gilberti skene de eodem Respectuatur cum consensu
parcium videlicet Roberti blindsel Willelmi blindsel et Johannis sincler' partis aduerse
ac Alexandri menyes nomine attornati dicti alexandri skene vsque diem Juridicum post festum Sancti
michaelis proximo futuro

The samen dai it was fundin be ane assise and deliuerit be James cvmyn that
Wilyam blindsele is awand of the rude malis for his croftis for twa yeris
xxti s' gif his land extendis tosamekil tobe pait til James lesly

In curia balliuorum tenta per eosdem in pretorio xxijdo die Julij anno quo supra / magister
Andreas cadiow plegius pro patricio murray super quem Dauid theman extendit
plegium in manu alexandri chamer seriandi pro iniusta detencione vij coronarum monete scocie
primo die vocatus ad intrandum dictum patricium prout fideiussit / non comparuit Ideo precipitur
seriando quod capto districto a dicto nostro andrea ipsum summoneat ad comparere faciendum
prefatum patricium die lune ad quindenam ad sectam dicti Dauid pro secundo die processus

Thomas narn et robertus fleschar' conuicti per assisam quilibet amerciatur pro perturbio moricij besat seriandi
ministrantis suum officium et pro infrictione communis ordinis
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxiijo die mensis supradicto /

quo die ballivi ex decreto
curie assignarunt thome symson diem lune ad quindenam ad respondendum Johanni lammyn
toune super plegio porrecto per eum de iniusta detencione xxiiijor solidorum

The samen dai thomas symson clamyt thomas browne in Jugement
of the wrangwis' putting furth of him of the thrid part of half a schip with
the ladyn of the samyn quhilk the said thom simson had in norway / the
quhilk action was put til ane assise of worthy personis / and thai
riply avisit fand and deliuerit the said thomas browne quite of thom symso
nis chalance except thre dens' merkis extendand til xviij s' scottis
for the quhilkis xviij s' Alexander chamer of murchil is becumin souerty topay
the said thomas symson within terme of law / And anent v crounis clamyt be
thomas symson fra the said thom brown / the assise has ordanit / that
gif thomas broun has sauld his part of the said schip or quhen scho
cumis to the market he sal content and pay thomas symson the said v crownis and
tharuppon he sal gif him his obligacion

the said dai It is appointit and accordit betuix John' fichet and thom broune
anent viij li g' and demi clamit be the said John fichet for the thrid part of a
schip / that gif the said Johne fichet be nocht pait of the said some' or his
factouris in flandris or on that syde the sey the tym of the making of this
act that the said Johne salhaf four' merkis scottis for ilke li' g' deliuerit til
him in abirdene And for the souerty of the payment heirof the forsaid thomas
broun has fundin Johne rolyn skippar of a norway schip duelland in
auslo dettour tolay the said some' of viij li' g' and demj in scottis money as
forsaid is in a evinly trew merchandis hand of abirdene tobe gevin to the
said John' fichet or his deputis quhat tyme certificacion cum of the de
faute of his payment at the terme forsaid / or the said skippar or his schip
pas oute of the havin of abirdene / and heirto the said Johne rolyn is ob
list be the fath of his body before thir witnes Robert blindsel murtho glen
maluin Sandris blindsel Johne fichet eldar and vthiris sindry

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjto die Julij anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

quo die andreas lammynton' posuit se in voluntate ballivis pro
perturbio Willelmi cardno et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Eodem die actio processus prosecuta pro Robertum ewynson' aduersus murthacum glenmaluin
plegium pro Willelmo richardson Respectuatur per ballivos cum consensu parcium modo et
forma quibus nunc existit vsque hodie ad quindenam tanquam diem peremptorem Et preci
pitur thome de marr' per ballivos ad intrandum eundem Willelmum dicto die ad instanciam
prefati murthaci responsurus ut Jura volunt

Item actio prosecuta pro parte Johannis talyour contra dominum Dauid vaus continuatur cum consensu parcium
in eodem statu quo nunc est vsque diem veneris sine preiudico cuiuscumque partis

head.note: This marginal heading is placed on page 859.

div.p:
The secund dai of August the yer' forsaid personaly comperit Johne fichet yongar
before the aldirman ballies and consale of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samyn
As for samekil as thomas symson resignit of before his land liand
in the overkirkgate in the handis of the ballies of the said burgh for securite
and payment of viij li' g' and demj for the quhilk he com souerty for Johne
rolyn eftir the tenour of the act made betuix the said Johne fichet and
Johne rolyn tharuppon / Of the quhilk souerty for the some' forsaid the said Johne
fichet has dischargit the said thomas symson his ayris executouris and assignais
now and for evyr

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe be the aldirman and ballies of
the samyn the vj dai of August yer' et cetera lxxxiiij James lesly John' of Knollis alexander
rede Dauid menyes yungar alexander of marr' thomas prat Dauid Kintor gilbert
morison' androw Wenton' thomas symson and Wilyam goldsmyth chosin and sworn in ane
assise / riply avisit ordanit and deliuerit that William blindsel sal content and pay til
thomas yair' for thre chaldir of beir' xliiij merkis scottis tharof xxxij merkis for
twa chaldir and xij merkis for the thrid chaldir / and this some' of xliiij merkis tobe
pait to the said thomas or his procuratouris within terme of law / And the said assise
has causit thomas yair' toremyt Wilyam blindsel his costis and scathis suste
nit be him in defaute of his payment

The samyn dai in presence of Androw culan ane of the ballies of abirdene Thomas yair'
has constitute and ordanit Alexander menyes James lesly Johne of Knollis Dauid menyes
yongar and maistir John' badenagh coniunctlie and seueraly his laghful procuratouris til ask
tak and ressaue in his name and on his behalf fra Wilyam blindsel the some' of
xliiij merkis scottis for thre chaldir of beir' eftir the tenour of the act and decreit gevin
be ane assise tharuppon quittance of thare ressate todeliuer Instrumentis and documentis
quhatsumeuir neidful tharuppon totak and torais' And has promittit be his hand
tohald ferm and stabil et cetera before thir witnes thom prat thom of chamer ser
Robert leis notar patrik rede John' of balcrommy and vthiris diuers'

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per prepositum et Dauid marr' vnum balliuorum
eiusdem ixno die Augusti anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die Judicium processus deductum per
Robertum ewynson contra murthacum glenmaluin plegium pro Willelmo richardson / propter debilitatem
istius curie continuatum fuit in eodem statu quo nunc vsque diem Jouis xij diem instantis
mensis absque preiudicio alicuius partis

Johannes Wormot secundo die vocatus ad sectam procuratorum murthaci glenmaluin pro xxxta s' non
comparuit / Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriando quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum
summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

Eodem die magister Andreas cadiow plegius patricij murray secundo die vocatus ad
intrare faciendum dictum patricium responsurus plegio porrecto per Dauid theman pro
iniusta detencione vij coronarum non comparuit nec dictum patricium comparere fecit / quare preci
pitur Duncano stralogh seriando leuare districtum de dicto magistro andrea et premunire
ipsum ad comparere faciendum dictum patricium ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam 3m diem processus

The xij dai of August yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij comperit before Thomas of fife ane of the
ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe Robert ewynson with his forspekar and askit warde and
dome of his process' led apon murtho glenmaluin borgh for William richardson continuit
to this dai / the quhilk ward and dome the said balye for waiknes of the court has
continuit vnto monundai next tocum in the samyn fourm and effect as this dai but preiudice
of ony partie And has ordanit morice besat seriand to warn the party or his procuratouris
gif ony be again the said day with Intimacion that the Juge wald procede than in the
said matir as law wil et cetera

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be William blindsel ane of the ballies of abirdene
the xvj dai of august yer' forsaid Wilyam malisson on the behalf of murtho glen
maluin his gude brudir in law entirit William richardson in Jugement for the
frething of the said murtho as borgh for him anent robert ewynson' et cetera

the samyn dai the action debatabil betuix Robert ewynson' and Wilyam richard
son is summittit with thir consentis til adam andirson thomas of marr' Wilyam ma
lisson gilbert leche Johne fichet Wilyam anffrason and Dauid spens sworn
todeliuer tharuppon safer as thai can haf knaulage / and the parties ar' sworn
and oblist tovndirly and fulfil thare decret and ordinance tobe pronuncit and gevin
furth the morn be none

Item the said dai in presence of the balye forsaid Johne colison grantit him tilhaf in
depois' and keping on the behalf of John' rolyn the some' of xxxiiij merkis of
the money of Scotland for viij li' g' and demj clamyt be Johne fichet for the
thrid part of a schip / tobe gevin and deliuerit be him to the said John' fichet / gif it
happinnis the said John' rolyn tofalye in the bringin of the certificacion / that
John' fichet sauld the thrid part of the said schip til Alstane duelland in
auslo in norway for viij li' g' and demj quhilk some' is content and pait til
the said Johne fichet or his factouris within the terme contenit in the deliuerence
of the assise tharuppon that is within yer' and dai / And gif the said Johne
rolyn bringis ane sufficent certificacione within the terme forsaid that the said
Johne fichet sauld his part of the schip and is pait tharof as said is the said
John' colisone sal refund and deliuer the xxxiiij merkis til the said Johne rolyn
or his procuratouris but fraude or gile

Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxjo die augusti anno Dominj
supradicto /

quo die personaliter comparuit in Judicio Dauid marr' procurator Anabelle
cassy matris sue quj produxit vnam litteram possessionis et sasine sub sigillo quondam Johannis
de Kintor vnius ballivorum dicti burgi de et super Juncta infeodacione quorundam crofto cum
pertinenciis dicte matri sue videlicet vnius crofti Jacentis inter croftum quondam henrici de
leith tam ex parte boriali quam australi / ac alterius crofti vocati le pennycroft Jacentis inter
croftum gilberti vaus ex parte australi et croftum andree ancroft ex parte boriali
necnon vnius crofti iacentis inter croftum quondam thome blindsel ex australi parte et croftum
quondam Willelmi fichet vocatum le halilandis ex boriali parte prout in huiusmodi littera lacius continetur
Qui procurator proposuit quod domino dictorum croftorum occupantur et detinentur quo titulo nescitur per
Alexandrum de marr' / quare peciit a ballivis quod occupatores et detentores eorundem et aliarum
terrarum ac annuorum reddituum dicte matri sue pertinencium vocarentur ad ostendendum Jura sua si
que habeant de eisdem / protestando solempniter ut prius quod detencio et occupacio dictorum
croftorum ac aliarum terrarum et annuorum Reddituum non cedat sibi nec dicte matri sue in preiudicium
quomodolibet in futurum

Eodem die actio mota inter Johannem de Kintor filium et heredem quondam gilberti de Kintor
cum suo prelocutore Alexandro Irvin de Drum ex vna et Dauid de Kintor ex altera partibus
de et super detencione quorundam croftorum dicto Johanni hereditarie pertinen' clamat' per eundem
Dauid occasione assedacionis eorundem ut ipse asseruit / posita fuit ad assisam proborum
virorum videlicet Jacobi lesly Johannis colison alexandri rede thome prat gilberti mo
rison Willelmi moyses andree atkin gilberti chamer et Johannis glenmaluin / quj
Jurati decreuerunt et deliberarunt per os dicti Jacobi lesly prelocutorum assise / quod
dictus Johannes de Kintor habet verum Jus ad omnia illa crofta quondam patris
suj per dictum Dauid occupata et quod dictus Dauid nullam habet assedacionem eorundem

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxiijo die mensis
Augusti anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

The quhilk dai comperit Alexander of marr' at the instance of Dauid marr' procuratour
for Annabel cassy his modir toansuer' for the occupacion and detencione of certane
croftis aboue writin pertening til the said annabillis Junctfeftment as is allegit
the quhilkis croftis the said alexander allegit his fee and heritage and askit ane
lauchful day toschaw his possession' of the samyn / and the ballies assignit
him this dai xv dais to the schawin of that ilk / And alexander menyes is becum
myn souerty be his hand to the ballies that al the corn being apon the said
croftis sal remain on the ground of the samyn quhil the possession' be
schawne as said is

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the aldirman and ballies of the samen
the xxvij dai of august the yer' forsaid comperit Johne of Knollis and maistre
Johne badenagh procuratouris til thomas yair' burges of edinburgh and askit
of a Wilyam blindsel payment fra the ballies Dauid marr' of xliiij merkis scottis eftir the
tenour of the act and decreit gevin be ane assise tharuppon' before thir witnes James
lesly Johne colison maistir androw cadiou Dauid mathoson androw branch and vthir sindry

the samyn dai it was ordanit be the assise that Dauid galichtlie suld restore
ane siluer belt til thom of culan pertening til gilbert of chavmeris wif and that
the said thomas sal deliuer that belt til the said gilbert of chameris wif
like as he was ordanit be ane assise of before

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the secund dai of Septembre
the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij . The assise fand and deliuerit that alexander hay as souerty for alexander
blayr suld pay Johne grig of the wol optenit be him eftir the tenour of the act made tharuppon
And gif alexander hay prefis with thomas fife Wil philp and philp of Dunbrek or with ony
twa of thaim the morn that Robert blindsel becom half souerty the said Robert sal pay
the half to Johne grig and fre him tharof

Item the said assise deliuerit that William quelp sal content and pay Dauid howison of xx s'
and a termis mail for the hous' occupiit be him within terme of law

The thrid dai of the moneth of Septembre forsaid . In the balye court haldin in the
tolbuthe of abirdene henry rede of Kincorth grantit him awand til Alexander rede ane
barrel of salmond quhilk he is oblist be the fath of his body topay to the said
alexander at Witsunday next tocum before thir witnes Johne the vaus eldar alexander
scrogis ser Johne striuelin notar and vthiris diuers'

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem sexto die
mensis Septembris anno Dominj supradicto

The quhilk dai the counsale and communite gadirit in the tolbuthe be premunicion of the common
bel . has ordanit decretit and deliuerit / that this last tax gaddirit for the expedi
cion and the expensis of the ambaxiate passit in Ingland sal pay the said taxt
And the remanent sal outred and pay the dettis of the toune And that in tym cuming
nane aldirman nor officeris of this burgh . sal spend mare somez' than thai
haf til dispone apon nor draw the toune in det forthir than the free common
gudis extendis to / And gif thai do the contrar heirof thai sal pay it of thare
awne purs' that is superexspendit

Item Janet fichet the spous' of thomas symson has constitute and ordanit John' of
ruthirfurd aldirman and Dauid menyes yongar coniunctlie and seueraly hir lachful
procuratouris in al causis and actionis concerning hir / and specialy anent the croft callit
the halylandis quhilk is debatabil betuix hir and John' colison' promittand tilhald
ferm and stabil et cetera

The samyn dai the action debatabil betuix Dauid marr' procuratour for his modir / and
alexander of marr' anent the twa croftis is continuit with consent of parties to thurisdai next
tocum the quhilk dai the parties ar ordanit toproduce and schaw thare richtis as thai wil
tyne and wyn and the corn is ordanit toremain on the grund in the mene tym

The vij dai of Septembre yer' et cetera lxxxiiij In the court haldin in the tolbuthe comperit
Johne howison son' and ayr of vmquhile alexander howisone the quhilk of his awne
fre wil and motife has oblist him be his hand . that he sal nothir sel wedset fore
mail nor analy . land or annuel not vthir mouabil gudis . for twa yeris tocum
withoute the avise assent and consent of alexander rede and androw culan or ane of thaim forthir
than to the neidful sustentacion of him self / quhilk salbe done be thare consel . And
gif he sal happin todo in contrar heirof it salbe of nane avail force nor effect

the samyn dai William quelp in presence of the aldirman ballies and consale has renuncit
and owyrgevin til Johne howisone al contractis tackis and condicionis made be the
said Johne til him before this day . for xx s' tobe gevin be the said Johne til the
vse of the said Wilyam / tharof xiij s' ar' ordanit be the aldirman and consel tobe deliuerit
til Wilyam frostir for the releving of thom rolland . and vij s' til the said William
And incontinent the key of John' howisonis' chavmer tobe deliuerit fra Wil quelp
til Johne howison' he beand pait of the vij s'

The ix dai of Septembre the yer' forsaid Duncan straloch seriand grantit in presence of
the aldirman and ballies that he intromettit with Dauid forbes at the instance of William blind
sel quhilk desirit souerty of the said Dauid that he and his gudis suld be scathles of him
vthirwais than law wald / And the said seriand is chargit be Androw culan ane of the
ballies tocompere at the instance of William blindsel on tusdai next tocum

the samen dai James lesly Alexander menyes Robert blindsel and Dauid menyes yongar
chosin and sworn in the action debatabil betuix patrik andirson and androw andirson thai swor
ne tovndirly thare deliuerance / quhilkis personis has decretit and ordanit that
the said androw sal content and pay to the said patrik fyve merkis iiijor s' and ij d' at marty
mes next tocum . for the payment of the quhilk some' Robert blindsel is cumin
